department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Compact Tracked Loader - Groupe 3 - Configuration A
description: The Government of Canada is soliciting proposals from suppliers meeting the requirements of the 2417-81SA to provide one (1) Compact Tracked Loader, ancillary items, and Integrated Logistic Support items, including training.
full_summary:
# Tenders Announcement
### Tender Details
* **Title:** Compact Tracked Loader - Groupe 3 - Configuration A (SA-E60HS-19BCKH)
* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01026836
* **Solicitation Number:** 10075655
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-21
* **Closing Date:** 2023-03-08T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contracting Authority:** Isadora Romero, Contracting Officer
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

This tender is open to suppliers who have a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH/A. To become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-651-78185

### Requirements
* The contractor is required to provide one (1) Compact Tracked Loader, ancillary items, and Integrated Logistic Support items, including training.
* The goods must be delivered to PSPC – Timiskaming Dam, 1 Route 63, Long Sault Island, Thorne, ON P0H 2J0.
* The requested delivery date is no later than Wednesday, May 31, 2023.
* Training may be delivered on the same day as the goods, or no later than Friday, June 2, 2023.

### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Ontario (except NCR)

### Regions of Delivery
* Ontario (except NCR)

### Contact Information
* Isadora Romero, Contracting Officer
* Telephone: 873-355-4964
* Email: [isadora.romero@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:isadora.romero@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) This tender has expired as of the
